alert.note: Alert for Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 27 at 2:13AM CST until February 27 at 3:15AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN WEBSTER AND EASTERN GREENE COUNTIES... At 213 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Willard to Springfield to near Nixa, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Rogersville, Strafford, Fair Grove, Fordland, Bassville, Turners, Galloway and Northview. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 74 and 97. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
